snippet: Prosecutors charged 12 people on Thursday with running a sex trafficking and prostitution ring across four Southern states.
abstract: Prosecutors charge 12 people with running sex trafficking and prostitution ring across Georgia, Florida and North and South Carolina.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors charged 12 people on Thursday with running a sex trafficking and prostitution ring across four Southern states.

headline.main: Georgia: 12 Are Charged in 4-State Sex Ring
headline.print_headline: Georgia: 12 Are Charged In 4-State Sex Ring
